alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Johnson; Massac; Pulaski; Union; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 8:13AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Union, northeastern Pulaski, northwestern Massac, Johnson, southern Williamson and southeastern Jackson Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 813 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cobden to near Jonesboro. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dongola around 825 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Goreville, Lake Of Egypt Area, Vienna, Karnak and New Columbia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 31. Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 21 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Johnson; Massac; Pulaski; Union; Williamson
